English: Why won't you leave me alone?
Chinese: 為什麼要管我？
Korean: 어째서 내버려 두지 않는 거야?
German: Warum lässt du mich nicht in Ruhe?

English:
I can't go back anymore.
I made too many mistakes.
Chinese:
已經，回不去了。
因為我做錯了太多……
Korean:
이제, 돌아갈 수 없어
많은 잘못을 저질러 버렸으니까…
German:
Ich kann nicht mehr zurück.
Ich habe zu viele Fehler gemacht.

English:
I failed, and as a result, EDEN is still claiming
more victims.
Chinese:
都是因為我失敗，
EDEN裡才又出現了犧牲者……
Korean:
내가 실패한 탓에
EDEN에서 또 희생을 내 버렸어…
German:
Ich habe versagt, und deswegen fordert EDEN immer
noch mehr Opfer.

English: What did I even think I was going to accomplish?
Chinese: 我已經，連自己究竟想做什麼都不知道了。
Korean: …이제는, 내가 뭘 하고 싶었는지조차 모르겠어
German: Was dachte ich nur, das ich erreichen würde?

English:
My father... my brother...
They've all left me.
Chinese:
爸爸也是……哥哥也是……
大家都從我面前消失了……
Korean:
아버지도… 오빠도…
모두 내 앞에서 사라져서…
German:
Mein Vater ... mein Bruder ...
Sie sind alle weg.

English:
I didn't want to admit I was alone...
But I've been alone for so long.
Chinese:
雖然不想承認我是一個人……
但是，我從好久以前開始就一直是一個人。
Korean:
외톨이라고 인정하고 싶지 않았어…
하지만, 난 오래전부터 혼자였어
German:
Ich wollte nicht zugeben, dass ich mich einsam
fühlte. Aber ich war so lange allein.

English:
So please... leave me be...
I'm better off by myself.
Chinese:
所以我已經……不在乎了……
我就算……孤伶伶一個人也無所謂……
Korean:
그러니까 이제… 내버려 둬요…
전 이제, 외톨이면 돼요
German:
Bitte ... lass mich ...
Ich bin allein besser dran.

English: Is this... the Digimon I gave to Fei?
Chinese: 這個是……我給菲的數碼寶貝？
Korean: 이건… 내가 페이에게 준 디지몬?
German: Ist das ... das Digimon, das ich Fei gegeben habe?

English: Yuuko, you are most definitely not alone.
Chinese: 悠子，妳絕對不是一個人。
Korean: 유코, 넌 결코 혼자가 아니야
German: Yuuko, du bist ganz gewiss nicht allein.

English:
Ever since you introduced me and Fei, we have had
each other.
Chinese:
因為妳讓菲和我相遇，
我和菲都不再是一個人了。
Korean:
네가 페이와 나를 만나게 해 주었으니까
나도 페이도, 혼자가 아니었어
German:
Seit du mich zu Fei gebracht hast, haben wir uns
beide.

English: You gave us a place where we could be ourselves.
Chinese: 妳給了我們歸屬……
Korean: 넌 우리들에게 있을 곳을 주었어…
German:
Du hast uns ein Plätzchen geschenkt, wo wir ganz
wir selbst sein konnten.

English: I stand with Fei, and Fei... she stands with you.
Chinese:
我在菲的身邊，
然後菲在妳的身邊……
Korean:
나는 페이의 곁에
그리고 페이는, 네 곁에…
German: Ich halte zu Fei und Fei ... hält zu dir.

English:
Try to remember.
Someone must have always been at your side.
Chinese:
想起來吧，
應該總有人陪在妳的身邊。
Korean:
떠올려 봐
네 곁에는 항상 누군가가 있었을 거야
German:
Versuche dich zu erinnern.
Jemand muss immer bei dir gewesen sein.

English: Even now...
Chinese: 現在也是——
Korean: 지금도―
German: Selbst jetzt ...

English:
Yes... [p]...
I see. Yes, you're right.
Chinese:
啊啊……[p]……
……沒錯，你說的對。
Korean:
아아… [p]… 씨…
…그렇구나, 그러네요
German:
Ja ... [p] ...
Verstehe. Ja, du hast recht.

English:
I remember something my father told me, when I
was little, and I was crying. He said...
Chinese:
我想起來了……爸爸說的話……
小時候，爸爸曾對哭泣的我說……
Korean:
…생각났어요…아버지의 말씀…
어릴 적에, 아버지가 울던 저에게 하셨던 말씀…
German:
Ich weiß noch, was mein Vater mir mal gesagt hat,
als ich noch klein war und weinte.

English:
"No one will be alone in the EDEN your daddy is
creating."
Chinese:
“在爸爸做的EDEN裡，
不會有人是孤單的。”
Korean:
"아빠가 만들고 있는 EDEN에서는
외톨이가 되는 사람은 한 명도 없어"
German:
„Im EDEN, das dein Papa erschafft, wird niemand
alleine sein.“

English:
"No matter how far apart their bodies might be,
they will still be able to reach out a hand to
each other."
Chinese:
“就算身體分隔兩地，如果有誰獨自一人在哭泣，
馬上就會有人伸出援手……。”
Korean:
"설령 몸이 멀리 떨어져 있어도, 누군가가 혼자서 울고 있으면
바로 손을 내밀어 줄 수 있는…"
German:
„Alle werden sich bei der Hand nehmen können,
so weit sie auch körperlich voneinander entfernt
sind.“

English:
That's what EDEN is for. A cyberspace unbound
by the laws of the physical world.
Chinese:
為此，而創造了EDEN.....
為此，而創造了不受物理原則束縛的電腦空間…..
Korean:
그러기 위한, EDEN…
그러기 위한, 물리원칙에 얽매이지 않는 전뇌공간…
German:
So war EDEN gedacht. Ein Cyberspace, der nicht
den Regeln der natürlichen Welt unterliegt.

English: Fei and I are by your side. Now and forever!
Chinese:
我們……還有菲，現在都和妳在一起，
往後也會一直在一起。
Korean:
우리들은… 페이는 지금도, 너와 함께 있어
앞으로도 계속
German: Fei und ich stehen dir zur Seite. Für immer!

English: I think I finally understand something Nokia said.
Chinese: 諾奇雅小姐所說的話，我終於能理解了。
Korean: …노키아 씨가 하셨던 말, 이제야 이해가 된 것 같아요
German:
Ich glaube, jetzt verstehe ich etwas endlich,
das Nokia mal gesagt hat.

English:
[p].
Thank you so much.
Chinese: [p]，謝謝。
Korean: [p] 씨, 감사합니다
German:
[p].
Ich danke dir von ganzem Herzen.

English:
For bringing my friends to me...
For reaching out a hand to me...
Chinese:
為了我，把“朋友”帶來——
對我伸出援手……
Korean:
"친구"를 데려와 주셔서―
저에게 손을 내밀어 주셔서…
German:
Dass du meine Freunde zu mir gebracht hast ...
Dich um mich bemüht hast ...

English: I'm in through here.
Chinese: 我在這裡面。
Korean: 전, 이 안쪽에 있어요
German: Ich stecke hier hinten drin.

English:
Please, get me out of here.
I want to be with you all again!
Chinese:
拜託，請把我……從這裡帶出去。
我想要再次――到你們的身邊去！
Korean:
부탁드려요, 저를… 이곳에서 데리고 나가 주세요
다시 한 번―― 당신들의 곁으로!
German:
Bitte hol mich hier raus.
Ich möchte wieder bei euch allen sein!
